channel.title: Automation on Derek Reinhardt
channel.description: Recent content in Automation on Derek Reinhardt

item.title: Perfecting Lazy
item.description: I just finished up work on a production last week. It was a great project that will is in the editing room right now. I had some fun designing the workflow for this project, and I will probably right about it in the future because it was a system that I had never tried before and it worked near flawlessly. Instead of that though I wanted to write about something a little more technical today.
